nars.util.meter

Class Metrics<RowKey,Cell>

  • java.lang.Object
    • nars.util.meter.Metrics<RowKey,Cell>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Object[]>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TemporalMetrics

    public class Metrics<RowKey,Cell>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Object[]>
    A tabular data store where each (# indexed) column represents a different type of value, and each row is a that value sampled/recorded at a different time point (first column).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Metrics()
      unlimited size
      Metrics(int historySize)
      fixed size
